en: Finally you receive feedback that is both specific and actionable. There's only one problem - you're not quite sure you agree with it.
What the beta-tester sees as an annoying problem, you intended as a feature! What should you do?
Tweaking it turns it into something vastly different from what you originally set out to do.
However, you're willing to do what it takes to make this product a success.
Maybe a few people won't like it, but you'll look at your product with pride knowing it is exactly what you wanted it to be.
